title: Andrej Pernecký
text: Andrej Pernecký (born 16 March 1991) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> goalkeeper who currently plays for the <a href="Slovak%20First%20Football%20League">Corgoň Liga</a> club <a href="FK%20DAC%201904%20Dunajsk%C3%A1%20Streda">FK DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda</a>.
